article.title: Lockheed Martin Awarded Multi-Year Contract
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Lockheed Martin and Australian Aerospace have signed a multi-year contract to provide Through-Life Support for the C-130J Super Hercules fleet operated by the Royal Australian Air Force. The contract is valued at $292 million. It will provide innovative solutions to C-130J maintenance and is designed to reduce the cost of ownership into the future.
